name: analytic

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.

short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
